formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Definition of the orthogonal vectors: \[ u_1 = v_1 \] \[ u_j = v_j - \sum_{i=1}^{j-1} \frac{\langle v_j, u_i\rangle}{\langle u_i, u_i\rangle}\,u_i, \quad j = 2,\dots,k. \] Normalisation to obtain an orthonormal family: \[ e_j = \frac{u_j}{\|u_j\|}, \quad \text{whenever } \|u_j\| \neq 0. \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Projection of \( v \) onto \( u \) (with \( u \neq 0 \)): \[ \mathrm{proj}_u(v) = \frac{\langle v, u\rangle}{\langle u, u\rangle}\,u. \]
